buildCommand: bash -c 'set -e && FLUTTER_VERSION=3.24.3 && echo "üì• Descargando Flutter $FLUTTER_VERSION..." && curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:$(pwd)/flutter/bin" && echo "‚úÖ Flutter instalado" && flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && echo "üåê Flutter Web habilitado" && flutter pub get && echo "üì¶ Dependencias instaladas" && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_KEY=$SUPABASE_KEY && echo "‚úÖ Build completado"'
installCommand: echo 'Flutter se instalar√° durante el build'
